  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/931</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/931</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els conills</string>
            <string language="en">Rabbits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaninchen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lapins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conigli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κουνέλια</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Material informatiu sobre les característiques dels conills, les seves parts, l'alimentació, la reproducció i també sobre on viuen. Conté activitats interactives i   un recull de tasques, fetes a classe i al laboratori, amb descripcions, dibuixos i fotografies. 
2n premi (infantil i primària) del 6è concurs de webs de ciència.</string>
            <string language="en">Information on rabbits, parts of the body, diet, reproduction, environment. It includes interactive activities and a selection of classroom and laboratory tasks, with descriptions, drawings and photos. Second prize (nursery and primary schools) in the 6th science webpage competition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">anatomia</string>
            <string language="en">anatomy</string>
            <string language="es">anatomía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cria de bestiar</string>
            <string language="en">breeding</string>
            <string language="es">cría de ganado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal domèstic</string>
            <string language="en">domestic animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal doméstico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über Kaninchen, Körperteile, 
Diät, Wiedergabe, Umgebung. Sie schließt interaktive 
Aktivitäten und eine Auswahl der Klassenzimmer- und Laboraufgaben, 
mit Beschreibungen, der Zeichnungen und der Fotos ein. Zweiter 
Preis (Baumschule und Primärschulen) in der 6. Wissenschaft Webseite 
Konkurrenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur les lapins, parties du corps, 
régime, reproduction, environnement. Il inclut des activités 
interactives et une sélection de salle de classe et de laboratoire 
charge, avec des descriptions, des schémas et des photos. 
Deuxième prix (pépinière et écoles primaires) en 6ème 
concurrence de page Web de la science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação nos coelhos, partes do corpo, dieta, 
reprodução, ambiente. Inclui atividades interativas e uma 
seleção de tarefas da sala de aula e do laboratório, com 
descrições, de desenhos e de fotos. Segundo prêmio 
(berçário e escolas preliminares) na ã competição do Web page da 
ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sui conigli facente parte il 
corpo, dieta, riproduzione, ambiente. Include le attività 
interattive e una selezione delle mansioni del laboratorio e 
dell'aula, con le descrizioni, delle illustrazioni e delle foto. 
Secondo premio (scuola materna e scuole primarie) nella sesta 
concorrenza di Web page di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για τα κουνέλια, μέρη του σώματος, 
διατροφή, αναπαραγωγή, περιβάλλον. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
διαλογικές δραστηριότητες και μια επιλογή των στοιχειωδών 
εργασιών τάξεων και εργαστηρίων, με τις περιγραφές, τα σχέδια και
τις φωτογραφίες. Δεύτερο βραβείο (βρεφικός σταθμός και 
σχολεία πρωτοβάθμιας εκπαίδευσης) στον 6ο ανταγωνισμό webpage 
επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anatomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Züchten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haustier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anatomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">multiplication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animal domestique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">anatomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">produzir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animal doméstico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anatomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">allevamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animale domestico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανατομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναπαραγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατοικίδιο ζώο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
